spec_data.Name: rubygem-drake
spec_data.Description:
Drake is an auto-parallelizing branch of Rake, a Make-like program
implemented in Ruby. Tasks and dependencies are specified in standard
Ruby syntax.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 11:06:27 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A branch of Rake supporting automatic parallelizing of tasks
